titulo: Experiencia Viva: Mateo [NVI The Bible Experience Alive: Mathew]
descripcion: Enjoy Mathew heard through the voices of servants, worshipers, pastors, and Bible teachers whose ministries and actions have blessed the Spanish-speaking church of the Lord. Experience the beauty, drama, tenderness, and transforming power of the Scripture in a way that you have never heard before. This historic audio production includes the voices of more than 50 of our most esteemed and well-known Hispanic Christian leaders.
